name: The Chaos Knight
description:
Our team of 3 introduces to you our very first 3D game - The Chaos Knight. 

The town was attacked! A knight of chaos with his ghouls just arrived to the gate and  is heading right to the Cathedral, the residence of a city' protector - mighty Paladin! Who will win this deadly clash?
